New installation using an RTE

  1. Define the target server xagi3p01 on NIM
    nim -o define -t standalone -a platform=chrp \
-a netboot_kernel=mp -a if1="find_net xagi3p01 0" \
-a net_settings1="auto auto" -a cable_type1=tp \
xagi3p01
  2. Perform an rte install
    1. AIX 6
      nim -o bos_inst -a bosinst_data=aixmigration-bosinst -a source=rte -a spot=610TL07-05_spot -a lpp_source=610TL07-05_lppsrc -a no_client_boot=yes -a accept_licenses=yes -a script=postinstallCloning xagi3p01
    2. AIX 7
      nim -o bos_inst -a source=rte -a spot=710TL02-02_spot -a lpp_source=710TL02-02_lppsrc -a no_client_boot=yes -a accept_licenses=yes penmsv01

After the base installation is completed log in as root and do the following steps to allow Post Installation Steps to be successfully completed

  1. NFS mount the lppsrc location
    sudo mkdir -p /mnt/aixupdates
sudo mount <nimserver>:/path/to/lppsrc /mnt/aixupdates
  2. For the smitty lovers,
    1. Change to the mount point
      cd /mnt/aixupdates

      Invoke smitty 

      sudo smitty install_all

      Then select ”.”

    2. press F4 or Esc4 to get a list of software that can be installed. From the list select the following items and select them using F7 or Esc7 as shown
  > openssh.base                                                       ALL
  + 6.0.0.6103  Open Secure Shell Commands                             
  + 6.0.0.6103  Open Secure Shell Server                               
                                                                       
  > openssh.license                                                    ALL
  + 6.0.0.6103  Open Secure Shell License                              
                                                                       
  > openssh.man.en_US                                                  ALL
  + 6.0.0.6103  Open Secure Shell Documentation - U.S. English
  1. After all have been selected as shown above press enter to retrun to the installation screen
    • PREVIEW only - should be set to no
    • COMMIT software updates must be set to yes
    • ACCEPT new license agreements? must be set to yes
    • Then hit enter :)
